attributes.action: Remove the clause specifically protecting Scottish Jobs in the LLoyds HBOS merger
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Directors of Lloyds TSB / HBOS should be free to make decisions on purely business grounds.

Requirements to favour one group of United Kingdom Citizens over another are iniquitous, divisive and should be illegal under UK and European law.

Accordingly we request and require the Prime Minister to immediately remove the clause relating to the protection fo only Scottish jobs.
